mapper.select: SELECT b.b_id, b.input_time AS inputTime, b.input_weight AS inputWeight, b.input_time AS proTime, b.input_weight AS proWeight, bm.model AS pattern, bm.f_id AS feedIds, b.number AS number, b.status, b.type FROM b_breed b LEFT JOIN b_breeding_mode bm ON b.bm_id = bm.bm_id where b.status = #{status} and b.type = #{type} order by b.bid asc
